>"Hydras should be informed about the current situation in Maximal Base"rep=
lied the male while he was dragging Tucson " and the female shouldl be move=
d to another place"
>=A0
>Perceptor replied "She wont move to any place and=
 whoever tries to free her for her cell, would be the indirect cause of her=
 death... But you are right, We have to move=A0 her to another secure place=
"
=A0
"Fine. Fine." Zarak said dismissively as he continued to watch Tuscon=
's still form. "Move the female maximal wherever you like, but Tuscon here =
will serve a purpose."

Cyclonus stepped over to look at Tuscon and then at=
 Zarak, "What are you planning?" His tone suspicious.

Zarak chuckled, "If =
we could use this one's likeness to Optimus Prime, we can use him to=A0give=
 us the power of the matrix, and then WE can destroy Unicron." Zarak rubbed=
 his hands together eagerly, "and then with the remaining power take over t=
his mud ball of a planet."

Cyclonus nodded, "Scourge, you're with us, Rodi=
mus report to Hydras, no doubt you will be needed here to secure the base."=
 

"What?!?!" Rodimus said, outraged at the prospect of staying at the base=
, "Who are YOU to tell ME what to do!" as he stepped up to Cyclonus, his op=
tics blazing, his fists clenched.

Scourge stepped up behind Cyclonus, obvi=
ously backing up his commander, and ready to take on Rodimus should he atta=
ck. 

Zarak for his part just smiled, scenes like these just distracted oth=
ers from him, and the question of what his agenda was.

(TAG)

OOC: Sandy, =

ked? It=A0would give you RP possibilities?? =A0In addition to the other thi=
ngs you had in mind :)
